title: Change in Physical State
text: Think about how the state of water changes when ice cubes melt.

title: Understanding Entropy Change
text: Entropy is a measure of disorder or randomness in a system. Adding ice cubes and causing them to melt changes the orderliness of the system.

title: Molecular Motion
text: Melting ice increases the molecular motion as water molecules move from solid to liquid, leading to an increase in randomness or disorder.

title: Final Decision
text: Based on the change in state and molecular motion, determine the sign of the entropy change.
